item.description:
THIS MEETUP GOT GREAT REVIEWS ON THE LAST TOUR.

The Cambridge Historical Society has kindly offered to host a Meetup especially for Nerd Fun and Social Fun at the amazing Hooper Lee Nichols house, one of the two remaining 17th century houses left standing in Cambridge! ...on "Tory Row".

http://www.cambridgehistory.org/HLN_House/HLN_main.htm

The society is asking for a $5 contribution (which will be collected by a greeter at the door) and the Meetup will last until 8 PM! So we can Meetup! This Meetup has been cross-posted with Social Fun.

There will be a checklist of those signed up.

This tour will be preceded by a reception, then the tour, and afterwards a Q 'n A.

Period costume is not required but it is encouraged.

Bringing along food and or drink is ENCOURAGED! (designated area only). The tour kindly supplied cookies and sparkling water last time. If you will contribute, please get there by six PM & specify what you are bringing. To do this, please click on the "change RSVP" button (green box), then write what you are bringing in the "comment", then re-click on the red "RSVP" button. Thanks!

This special tour is being offered courtesy of the Cambridge Historical Society:

http://www.cambridgehistory.org/

Parking arrangements: parking certificates will be available at the Hooper-Lee-Nichols House.
item.name: Special Tour of the Hooper-Lee-Nichols House--Cambridge
